dict.string: Three years later, Subaru debuts its second most important model of all time, which is another variant on the station-wagon/sport-utility mashup, this time shading more toward the latter. Whereas the Outback uses the body of an actual station wagon, the Impreza-based Forester receives its own sheetmetal, and cuts a taller, boxier profile than the Impreza wagon; it also offers 7.5 inches of ground clearance, enhancing its outdoorsy cred.
